docs.title: Executive Architecture & AI Portfolio
docs.text:
Role: Enterprise Architect | GCP Professional Cloud Architect | Professional MLE

Over 10 years of experience architecting SaaS solutions, now focused on the intersection of Enterprise Architecture (TOGAF) and Agentic AI.

docs.title: Core Expertise
docs.text:
• Frameworks: TOGAF 9.2, SAFe 6.0 SPC
  • Cloud: Google Cloud (Professional Architect Certified)
  • AI/ML: Vertex AI, GenAI, Agentic Swarms (LangGraph, CrewAI)

docs.title: The "GreenOps" Standard
docs.text: Every project in this portfolio follows my proprietary "Enterprise-Grade Lifecycle": 1. Strategy: Persona-driven business cases. 2. Architecture: TOGAF-aligned vision and artifacts. 3. Intelligence: Agentic workflows and ML models. 4. Scale: Production-ready GCP infrastructure.

docs.title: Technical Project Gallery
docs.text:
Browse the architectural blueprints and implementation details for my flagship projects:

  • GreenOps Platform: Carbon-Aware Cloud Optimizer.
  • FinRisk Sentinel: Real-time Financial Crime Agent Swarm.
  • ContractGuard: Agentic Contract Intelligence.
  • RevRec-AI: Autonomous Revenue Recognition.
  • Exec Strategy Dashboard: Lean Portfolio Management Tool.

(Click any project to see the full EA + MLE documentation suite)
